{
  "file": "Login.aspx",
  "vulnerabilities": [
    {
      "title": "Insecure Password Storage",
      "severity": "HIGH",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-256",
      "description": "The code does not specify how passwords are stored. If passwords are stored in plaintext or using weak hashing algorithms, this poses a significant security risk.",
      "line_numbers": [1],
      "recommendation": "Ensure that passwords are stored securely using strong hashing algorithms (e.g., bcrypt, Argon2) and never in plaintext."
    },
    {
      "title": "Potential Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)",
      "severity": "MEDIUM",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-79",
      "description": "The FailureText literal is not sanitized, which could allow an attacker to inject malicious scripts if the error message is manipulated.",
      "line_numbers": [40],
      "recommendation": "Sanitize all user inputs and outputs to prevent XSS attacks. Use built-in encoding methods to encode output."
    },
    {
      "title": "Lack of Account Lockout Mechanism",
      "severity": "HIGH",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-307",
      "description": "The login form does not implement an account lockout mechanism after a certain number of failed login attempts, making it susceptible to brute-force attacks.",
      "line_numbers": [1],
      "recommendation": "Implement an account lockout mechanism after a predefined number of failed login attempts to mitigate brute-force attacks."
    },
    {
      "title": "Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR)",
      "severity": "MEDIUM",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-639",
      "description": "The login process does not validate the user's identity properly, which could allow unauthorized access to user accounts if the authentication logic is flawed.",
      "line_numbers": [1],
      "recommendation": "Ensure that the authentication logic properly validates user credentials and implements proper session management."
    }
  ]
}
